text.desc:
28th April 54 I do not know a thing about Setubal wines. Once can see that this one is a very old wine, according to the label 43 years old. Undoubtedly the volatile acidity is excessive for a muscat grape wine and does not make it so pleasant to drink. What the original acidity was and what is due to age it is hard to tell, but I daresay the original acidity was on the high side. The flavour undoubtedly detects the muscato grape. It sum up and proving that your vintage is the ame at that of the arne -- I think, you have worn much better. 
28th April I do not know a thing about Setubal wines, one can see that this one is a very old wine. According to the label, 43 years old - undoubtedly the volatile acidity is excessive for a muscat grape wine, and does not make it so pleasant to drink. What the original acidity was, and what is due to age it is hard to tell. But I daresay but I dare say the original acidity was on the high side. The flavour was doubledly detects the muscato grape. To sum up and show ung that your vintage is the same as that of the wine - I think you have worn much better. M. M. Gonzalez & son
